Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic and the main character, setting the initial premise.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Cover Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The cover page introduces the comic title, main character, setting, and initial premise.

Major_Arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Service and Transformation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Duke's initial taxi driving scene, the introduction of G-Man Holden, and Duke's transformation into Human Meteor, hinting at an impending superhero action.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride for Rich Passengers
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, picks up rich playboys and takes them to the waterfront, encountering initial restrictions but overcoming them with a special pass.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Transformation at the Waterfront
sub_scenes.description: Duke notices G-Man Holden's car, becomes suspicious, and transforms into Human Meteor, preparing for action.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Initial Superhero Actions and New Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's first actions against criminals, his meeting with G-Man Holden in the hospital, and the setup for his mission to investigate the suspicious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Cop Shooters
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts and apprehends suspected 'cop shooters'.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Briefing and New Mission Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor visits G-Man Holden in the hospital and receives a new mission regarding a suspicious yacht and a potential Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of the Yacht
sub_scenes.description: Duke and Toby plan the yacht infiltration, and Toby successfully stows away.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Mission Initiation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Duke's investigation on the yacht, Toby's capture and rescue, and Duke's underwater mission to investigate the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Crew Observation and Depth Chart Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke observes the yacht crew and investigates Pete's cabin, discovering a depth chart marking suspicious stops.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Capture, Rescue, and Yacht's True Mission Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Toby is captured and thrown overboard, but Duke rescues him, revealing Toby's undercover role and the yacht's mission to meet a submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Underwater Approach and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke approaches the yacht underwater and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine being resupplied.

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Resupply Operation
sub_scenes.description: Inside the submarine, the torpedo resupply operation is underway.

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Conflict and Surface Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the underwater fight with divers, Duke's attack on the submarine and ship, and the subsequent surface investigation and evidence gathering.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Divers Attack and New Threat
sub_scenes.description: Duke is attacked by divers in old-fashioned gear, then confronts a new diver before a tentacle attacks the new diver.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Attacks and Shipboard Incident
sub_scenes.description: Duke attacks the submarine and then targets the ship, while a mysterious incident occurs on the ship's deck.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air

sub_scenes.title: Surface Evidence and Trip Home
sub_scenes.description: Duke surfaces, finds the depth map on the yacht, and, with Toby, takes a motorcycle ride and visits Holden in the hospital before going home.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Accidental Encounter and Bus Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Skip and Chuck and their accidental involvement in a spy plot, starting with an ambulance and leading them to a suspicious bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Nazi Fiends Fantasy and Ambulance Observation
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck are introduced with a brief imagined scene of Nazi confrontation, followed by their observation of an ambulance arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Marine Encounter Near Garage
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet leading them to the bus garage area, where they observe a marine saluting a civilian.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate
Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation at the Bus Garage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the boys' arrival at the bus garage, their encounter with Mr. Horst, and the escalating tension and threat they face.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Initial Interaction at Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: The boys arrive at the bus garage to return the wallet and are led inside.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait
Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, while in another room, accusation and threats escalate, including a carbon monoxide plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents
Accusation of Lying in Another Room

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Overpowering, and Bronson's Shooting
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, the boys are overpowered, threatened, and Major Bronson is suddenly shot by Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution at the Bus Garage and Marine Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the boys seeking help, Marine intervention, discovery of sabotage plans, and the Marines' arrival to resolve the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Marine Sergeant Encounter
sub_scenes.description: The boys decide to seek help; Chuck encounters a Marine Sergeant.

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage Plans Discovery and Marine Barracks Alert
sub_scenes.description: Skip discovers sabotage plans in a secret office, and Marines are alerted to Major Bronson's danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation
Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrival and Spy Ring Defeat
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, intervene in the fight, and ultimately dismantle the Nazi spy ring, despite Major Bronson's injury.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry and South American Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry and sets up their new adventure in South America, starting with their discovery and confrontation in a sleepy town.

sub_scenes.title: Champ and Henry Introduction and Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and the setting of their fight against Axis powers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry

sub_scenes.title: Discovery and Confrontation in South American Town
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are located in a South American town, leading to a confrontation with local officers.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rosita's Kidnapping Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated, and the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue Mission and Confrontation with El Tigre
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Champ and Henry's abduction, their plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, and their initial confrontation with him.

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and Hideout Planning
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are abducted and taken to a location where a rescue plan for Rosita is discussed.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and Distraction
sub_scenes.description: The group infiltrates El Tigre's hideout, using a distraction tactic.

Major_Arcs.title: Inside El Tigre's Hideout - Search for Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts events inside El Tigre's hideout, focusing on the search for Rosita, interrogation of El Tigre, and the revelation of Axis agents' involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Interrogation of El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: Inside the hideout, there's confrontation and interrogation, with focus shifting to finding Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Location Revealed and Urgent Rescue Plan
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's imprisonment by Axis agents is revealed, leading to an urgent rescue plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions
Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the rescue of Rosita, the combat involved, and the recognition and arrival of government troops after the rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Horseback Pursuit and Building Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit on horseback leading to infiltration of a building.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Intense combat during the rescue operation, including hand-to-hand fighting and machine gun threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Post-Rescue Gratitude and Government Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Gratitude and recognition are exchanged after the fight, and government troops arrive.

narrative_arcs.title: Government Troops and Search for Fascists

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan and his jungle mission, his capture by enemies, and initial interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Disobedience Report
sub_scenes.description: Dolan engages in jungle combat and reports to Captain Lawton about disobeying orders.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Ambush in the Jungle
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit into the jungle river leads to an ambush of the officer.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Interrogation Begins
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured and interrogation by Grauer begins.

Major_Arcs.title: Torture, Resistance, and Dolan's Action
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Dolan's torture, his forced compliance, but then his act of resistance by burning supplies.

sub_scenes.title: Commander's Orders and Torture Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Orders are given to ensure no American soldiers land and to obtain sub detector plans; torture preparations are made.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Confession and Arson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan confesses but then takes action by setting fire to enemy supplies.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Enemy Reaction
sub_scenes.description: A marine pursues Dolan, while the enemy dismisses the fire and focuses on their objective.

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Fight and Resolution in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Dolan's fight with the natives, the death of the chief leading to native gratitude, and the resolution of the jungle conflict, followed by service discipline.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Fight and Native Chief's Death
sub_scenes.description: Dolan attacks natives, leading to a fight and the accidental death of the native chief.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives

sub_scenes.title: Natives' Gratitude and New Objective
sub_scenes.description: Natives show gratitude to the marine after the chief's death, and a new 'skunk chase' objective is hinted.

narrative_arcs.title: Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

sub_scenes.title: Service Discipline and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The Captain makes a decision, intervenes in a fight, and service discipline is enforced.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Burgess Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case - the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Premise Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the premise of their stories.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing
sub_scenes.description: The Twinkle Twins are briefed on the Burgess murder case at their newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane inquire about Tom Reilly at the police station and then visit him at the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigation - Reilly's Escape and Community Help
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the Twinkle Twins' investigation into Reilly's situation, their suspicions about Farnacci, and the dramatic events leading to Reilly's escape and community intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Impression and Racketeering Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane form a gentle impression of Miss Reilly and begin suspecting Farnacci's racketeering.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Explanation
sub_scenes.description: Investigation in the Irish section leads to Mrs. Murphy, who explains Tom Reilly's situation and danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

Major_Arcs.title: Community Rescue and Medical Emergency Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the car chase, community blockade and uprising, police intervention, and the medical emergency for Reilly resolved by community blood donation.

sub_scenes.title: Car Chase and Community Blockade
sub_scenes.description: Car chase after Reilly's escape, stopped by a community blockade.

sub_scenes.title: Police Assessment and Rushing to Shooting Scene
sub_scenes.description: Police assess the crime scene, and the twins rush to the shooting scene.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Arrival and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Arrival at the hospital, need for blood transfusion, and community offers to donate blood.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigation Resolution and Celebration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins' story with the successful blood transfusion, Reilly's recovery, Farnacci's arrest, and a celebratory ending.

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Reilly's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Community responds to the call for blood donors, leading to Reilly's successful transfusion and recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Community Responds to Blood Donation Call

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Celebration of Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Farnacci is arrested, and a celebration is held for Reilly's daughter's recovery, concluding the story.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci
Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment
